pkgmetadata.longdescription: Langmuir Semi-Empirical Coagulation Model // Implements the Edwards (1997) doi:10.1002/j.1551-8833.1997.tb08229.x Langmuir- based semi-empirical coagulation model, which predicts the concentration of organic carbon remaining in water after treatment with an Al- or Fe-based coagulant. Data and methods are provided to optimise empirical coefficients.
